title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 826/94 of 13 April 1994 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2385/91 and (EEC) No 3567/92 and laying down certain detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89 as regards the incorporation of rights exceeding the limits of 500 and 1 000 animals into individual limits
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 826/94 of 13 April 1994 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2385/91 and (EEC) No 3567/92 and laying down certain detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89 as regards the incorporation of rights exceeding the limits of 500 and 1 000 animals into individual limits
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall inform producers by 31 July 1994 at the latest of their recalculated individual limits following the incorporation of the limits of 500 and 1 000 animals provided for in Article 5a (6) of Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
Articles 1 and 2 shall apply from the beginning of the 1995 marketing year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
